thread.title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
thread.title_full: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS

title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
text:
> Sports Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS Chicago Cubs' Jorge Soler (68) celebrates in the dugout after hitting a home run against the St. Louis Cardinals during the sixth inning of Game 3 in baseball's National League Division Series, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Paul Beaty) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
